text: “Eghtɨ Israelɨn gumazir dapanir fofozir aghuiba itiba, me gumazamizibar akurvagh nɨghnɨzir aghuiba me danɨngam. Eghtɨ men tarazi, apaniba mɨdorozir sababar me mɨsoghtɨ me arɨmɨghiram, egh tarazi me me dapongtɨ me arɨmɨghiram. Egh me gumazir dapanir tabar bizitaba okɨmɨva me isɨ kalabus darɨgham. Egh me arazir kam dughiar ruarimɨn a damighan kogham.
